gold.user: A project manager looking to retrieve all priority schemes available in the Jira Cloud platform to better manage project tasks.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all priority schemes with their details.

gold.user: A Jira administrator wanting to create a new priority scheme for a specific project to ensure tasks are prioritized correctly.
gold.ideal: Creates a new priority scheme and returns the details of the created scheme.

gold.user: A developer needing to find suggested priority mappings for a new project setup in Jira.
gold.ideal: Returns suggested priority mappings based on the provided input.

gold.user: A team lead wanting to check which priorities are available under a specific priority scheme to assign tasks effectively.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of available priorities for the specified priority scheme.

gold.user: An administrator who needs to remove an outdated priority scheme that is no longer in use.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified priority scheme and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: A project manager updating an existing priority scheme to reflect new project requirements and priorities.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified priority scheme and returns the updated details.

gold.user: A project coordinator needing to review the priorities associated with a specific priority scheme for reporting purposes.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of priorities associated with the specified priority scheme.

gold.user: A product owner wanting to see which projects are using a specific priority scheme to assess its effectiveness.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of projects that are associated with the specified priority scheme.
